text: Khurshid Mahmud Kasuri (; born 18 June 1941) is a Pakistani politician and writer. He served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Pakistan from November 2002 to November 2007. He also wrote the nonfiction book Neither a Hawk Nor a Dove. He was born in Lahore, Punjab. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Foreign relations of Pakistan Category:Politicians from Lahore Category:Punjabi people Category:Writers from Lahore
title: Khurshid Mahmud Kasuri
